moves.1. e4: Hi everyone, game part of the 123GK Tournament. I'm playing an experienced player. King opening for utopia
moves.3... a6 4. Ba4 Nf6 5. O-O b5 6. Bb3 Bc5: With this move white is preparing the soldier push for City Centre
moves.8... Ba7: I decide to retreat and keep the diagonal
moves.9. a4: White is pushing forward soldiers on the queen side
moves.10. Na3 b4: Black push b soldier in white territory to force le Chevalier blanc to decide
moves.11. Nc2 bxc3: b soldier accomplish his mission by opening white soldier backline
moves.12. bxc3 Nxe4: Le chevalier noir jump in City centre to open field space
moves.13. Qe1: White Lady positioning i e file targeting le Chevalier noir & control further movement at the City Centre upcoming collapse
moves.13... Nf6 14. dxe5 dxe5 15. Nxe5 Bb7: Black development complete with 2 priest together targeting the white king
moves.16. Ba3: white priest too aligned targeting my Renzo
moves.16... Nxe5: Action starts by le Chevalier noir
moves.17... Nd3: Le chevalier noir jumping close to the white Lady and preparing attack on f2
moves.18. Qe2 Nxf2 19. Bb4: the priest retreat - white prefer taking the risk than exchange pieces
moves.19... Nf6g4: Le deuxieme chevalier noir s'approche du roi blanc
moves.20. Bxf7+: and white try to bring out the Renzo from his castle
moves.20... Kh8: Renzo prefer staying in his Castle
moves.21. Rae1: White big cannon on e file looking for a mate
moves.22. Kh1 Qh4: La dame Noire rentre en jeu puissante et le blanc resigne.
